sideBar.selectCreateRestore: Select, create or restore a wallet to access wallet functions

errors.title: DFI Block Processing Center
errors.detail: It seems that you stumbled here by accident. This is where our workers make sure every DFI block is properly fastened to the chain. As this is a restricted area, we kindly ask that you turn around.
errors.insufficientFunds: Insufficient UTXO DFI for transaction fees. Please send some DFI from an exchange or another wallet and try again.

helpPage.title: Help
helpPage.helpPageHeader: Connect with the community with these options:
helpPage.helpTextFooterLine1: DeFiChain is a community-driven and open project.
helpPage.helpTextFooterLine2: The DeFiChain Foundation does not provide direct support.

masterNodesPage.title: Masternodes
masterNodesPage.restartNeeded: You need to restart DeFi Wallet to apply these changes. Do you want to restart?
masterNodesPage.tooltipMasternode: If you have a masternode, your app needs to be open with an unlocked wallet to be able to mint.

createMasterNode.title: Create masternode
createMasterNode.lackOfBalanceMsg: Unable to create masternode due to lack of funds. A minimum of 20,000 DFI is required to create a masternode
createMasterNode.confirmationText: Are you sure you want to create a masternode?
createMasterNode.restartNodeConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to restart the node?
createMasterNode.masterNodeSuccess: You can manually set the masternode config in defi.conf or you can automatically set this masternode config by restarting the node.
createMasterNode.noticeMasternodeOperator: If masternode operator is different from owner
createMasterNode.noticeMasternodeOwner: Owner address where collateral funds will be drawned from

masternodeDetailPage.confirmation: Are you sure you want to resign a masternode?

createToken.label: Label
createToken.name: Name of token
createToken.decimalText: Number of decimal places. Cannot be changed once set.
createToken.mintText: You can mint tokens after it has been created.
createToken.optionalFinalSupplyLimitText: Immutable total supply limit. Leave blank for unlimited supply. Cannot be changed once set.
createToken.createConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to create a token?
createToken.updateConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to update a token?

tokenInfo.name: Name
tokenInfo.confirmation: Are you sure you want to destroy the token?
tokenInfo.notMintedAlert: You have not minted the token

mintToken.title: Mint
mintToken.transactionSuccessMsg: Transaction successful. Your token balance will update once the transaction has been confirmed by DeFiChain.

dctDistribution.addAddressesText: Add addresses to your initial distribution list.
dctDistribution.dragAndUploadCSV: Drag or choose a CSV file to upload.

liquidityPage.title: Liquidity
liquidityPage.yourLiquidityInfo: You can now liquidity mine for potential high yields. Pick a pool pair below, supply liquidity to power the DEX (Decentralized Exchange) to start earning fees and annual returns. You may withdraw at any time.
liquidityPage.noLiquidity: No liquidity found. Would you like to add liquidity to the pool?
liquidityPage.blockTransactionFailed: Please wait for your transaction to be reflected in the next block before proceeding with a new transaction.

swapPage.title: DEX
swapPage.decentralizedExchangeInfo: Welcome to the DefiChain DEX (Decentralized Exchange) – a non-custodial exchange that is completely and truly decentralized.
swapPage.verifyTransactionSwap: Please verify transaction and press SWAP
swapPage.transactionSuccessMsg: Your account balance will update once the transaction has been confirmed by DeFiChain
swapPage.noLiquidity: No liquidity found. Would you like to add liquidity to the pool?
swapPage.yourPrivateKeyInfo: Be in control of your own private key.
swapPage.nonCustodialInfo: Your funds stay in your wallet and never pass through a centralized exchange.
swapPage.decentralizedInterfaceInfo: Transact directly with the blockchain from your app, without ever touching a server.
swapPage.poweredLiquidityPoolsInfo: Swaps are fulfilled via automated liquidity pools, not centralized order books.
swapPage.priceImpactWarning: Trade volume exceed %{percentage}% of pool size. There will be considerable price impact if you proceed with the swap.
swapPage.defichainAnalytics: More insights available at the community-maintained:

poolTab.noLiquidity: No liquidity found. Would you like to add liquidity to the pool?
poolTab.apyTooltipMessage: APR indicated here only includes DFI incentives, without commission. Actual APR with commission is thus higher.

addLiquidity.selectInputTokens: Select tokens and enter amounts to swap
addLiquidity.verifyTransactionSupply: Please verify transaction and press SUPPLY
addLiquidity.transactionSuccessMsg: Your account balance will update once the transaction has been confirmed by DeFiChain
addLiquidity.ratioMoreThan1: Ratio has moved by more than 1%. Please check your amounts and re-enter
addLiquidity.ratioChanged: Ratio has changed. Please check your amounts and re-enter
addLiquidity.label: Label
addLiquidity.insufficientUtxos: Insufficient UTXOS to perform add liquidity

removeLiquidity.label: Label
removeLiquidity.enterRemoveLiquidityAmount: Enter amount of liquidity to remove
removeLiquidity.verifyTransaction: Please verify transaction and press CONFIRM
removeLiquidity.transactionSuccessMsg: Your liquidity list will update once the transaction has been confirmed by the DeFi blockchain

settings.title: Settings
settings.incorrectPassphrase: The current passphrase entered is incorrect.
settings.autoLockMNWarning: Auto-lock timeout is disabled when masternode(s) are active.
settings.preventAccidental: Prevent accidental sending with a countdown
settings.preFundTxnsDescription: Sends 0.1 DFI to every address you own to pre-fund future transactions which require DFI.
settings.reindexDescription: Rebuilds blockchain database from existing block data, when block data is corrupt or cannot be read.
settings.passpharaseInfo: Secure the wallet data on your computer with a passpharse.
settings.resetAndReindexInfo: Deletes existing peers and block data, redownloads data then reindex (rebuild blockchain database).
settings.rescanInfo: Restart node and scan for any missing addresses

createOrRestoreWalletPage.title: Wallet - Create or restore wallet
createOrRestoreWalletPage.walletSyncNotice: You will be able to create or restore a wallet when sync is complete.
createOrRestoreWalletPage.enterPassphrase: Enter the passphrase which you will use to unlock your wallet.

createNewWalletPage.title: Wallet - Create a new wallet
createNewWalletPage.mnemonicGuideline: Write down the following 24 words below. It is important to write them down in the exact numbered order. This 24-word mnemonic seed will be used to recover or transfer your wallet. Without it, you will not be able to recover your wallet. Don't lose it.
createNewWalletPage.mnemonicGuidelineWarning: Do not store your wallet recovery phrase on a computer or smartphone, and keep it secure.
createNewWalletPage.generateNewSet: Generate a new set of 24 words
createNewWalletPage.walletRecoveryInfoLine1: A wallet recovery seed (“mnemonic seed”, “seed phrase”, “seed words”) is a way to represent your private key as a sequence of words that are easier for a human to remember. It is also used to generate extended keys for all the wallets you create in the app.
createNewWalletPage.walletRecoveryInfoLine2: The words are randomly generated from a list of 2048 words defined in the BIP39 standard, and provide 24 bit of safety.
createNewWalletPage.copied24Words: I’ve copied down the 24 words in the exact order

verifyMnemonicPage.title: Wallet - Verify mnemonic seed
verifyMnemonicPage.verifyMnemonicGuideline: To ensure you have written down your 24-word mnemonic seed, please identify which 6 words are in your mnemonic seed.
verifyMnemonicPage.skipVerificationText: Please ensure you have written down your 24-word wallet recovery seed, in the correct order. Without your wallet recovery seed, you will not be able to recover your wallet or restore it again.

restoreWalletPage.title: Wallet - Restore wallet
restoreWalletPage.restoreWalletGuideLine: Enter the 24 words in your mnemonic seed to restore wallet.

sendPage.pleaseVerifyAmount: Please verify the amount and recipient
sendPage.transactionSuccessMsg: Transaction successful. Your wallet balance will update once the transaction has been confirmed by DeFiChain.
sendPage.pleaseTransferFunds: Please transfer some DFIs to your account
sendPage.sendLPWarning: It appears you are sending liquidity pools share (LP) tokens. Please be aware that sending your LP tokens to another DeFiChain address will transfer your liquidity pool share to that address. Sending LP tokens anywhere other than another DeFiChain wallet, such as an exchange, may result in irreversible loss of funds.
sendPage.sendLPConfirm: I confirm that I intend to send LP tokens and I acknowledge that sending LP tokens to addresses that are not DeFiChain wallets may result in irreversible loss of funds.

receivePage.label: Label
receivePage.createNewAddressNotice: Give your new DFI address a meaningful label
receivePage.enterAnAddress: Enter an address in your account
receivePage.existingAddressOthers: Invalid address. Please check that this belongs to you.

walletPage.tokenDescription: DeFiChain uses token standards to bring in external tokens in a trustless manner, allowing trustless financial contracts and trading of all major crypto-asset tokens. The token standards are similar to ERC20 on Ethereum and Omni on Bitcoin blockchain. Through this standard, DeFiChain allows tokenization of any assets.
walletPage.tokenSub: On DeFiChain, the standardized tokens are called DeFi Standard Token (DST). DST tokens are of two different types: DCT, created by users of the system, and DAT, which are asset-backed tokens created with the backing of crypto-assets.
walletPage.utxoVsDFI: UTXO DFI vs Token DFI, what's the difference?
walletPage.twoForms: DFI exists in two forms – UTXO and Token, which are interchangeable depending on the usage. You can easily convert between the two forms within the app.
walletPage.mainForm: UTXO DFI is the main form DFI and is used for core cryptocurrency purposes like send, receive and fees. Token DFI are used for DeFi functions such as swaps and liquidity mining.
walletPage.dfiBalance: Your DFI balance includes both UTXO and Token form.

encryptWalletPage.title: Encrypt wallet
encryptWalletPage.unableToUnlockYourWallet: Unable to unlock your wallet? Reset DeFi Wallet to default data and settings, then restore your wallet from your wallet recovery seed or backup (wallet.dat).
encryptWalletPage.walletIsLocked: Wallet locked. To proceed with your transaction, please unlock with passphrase.

alerts.masterNodeOperatorAddressFailure: Masternode operator address is not present
alerts.restartNode: Restarting node. This may take a few minutes.
alerts.refreshUtxos: Refreshing UTXOs. This may take some time.
alerts.electronRequiredError: Electron app is needed for restart
alerts.addressIsNotAPartOfWallet: %{addressName} is not a part of wallet.
alerts.updateAppNotice: You need to restart DeFi Wallet to apply the update. Do you want to restart?
alerts.showUpdateAvailableHeader: An update is available for DeFi Wallet
alerts.showUpdateAvailableNotice: Would you like to update? Kindly leave DeFi Wallet running for the next 30 minutes, pruning work will take place and result in reduced storage required on your computer.
alerts.restartAppWithReindexNotice: Corrupted block database detected. You can restart the app via node sync or snapshot download. Do you want to restart?
alerts.backupWalletNotice: Please back up your wallet before updating your app in order to avoid any mishap. Do you want to back up your wallet?
alerts.backupWalletDatNotice: Your wallet is not ready yet. Do you want to create a backup of your wallet.dat file?
alerts.encryptWalletNotice: Enabling wallet locking with a passphrase is recommended for security. Enter the passphrase that you will use to unlock your wallet.
alerts.encryptWalletWarning: Keep your passphrase safe. Losing it means that you need to reset the DeFi Wallet app to default settings and restore your wallets again.
alerts.walletUnlockMessage: Enter your passphrase and select a duration to unlock your wallet.
alerts.walletUnlockMasternodeMessage: You are currently running a masternode on a locked wallet. Please unlock your wallet with your passphrase to continue minting.
alerts.backupWalletWarning: Creating a new wallet or restoring one will override any existing wallets in the app. Do you want to back up your existing wallet?
alerts.restartWalletWarningNotice: You need to restart DeFi Wallet. Do you want to restart?
alerts.resetWalletDatNotice: Are you sure you want to reset?
alerts.confirmResetWalletText: To confirm reset wallet, type '%{text}' in the field.
alerts.restoreYourWallet: Restore your wallet from the following backup?
alerts.exitBackupWarning: Exiting your wallet now will remove your wallet from the app. To access this wallet again later, you will need the wallet backup. Do you want to create a wallet backup first before exiting?
alerts.walletBackupWarning: Wallet has been encrypted successfully. Please back up your wallet immediately. Do you want to proceed?
alerts.nodeVersionUpdate: The node has been updated to version %{version}. A restart is required for re-indexing and changes to take effect. Do you want to restart now? Kindly leave DeFi Wallet running for the next 30 minutes, pruning work will take place and result in reduce storage required on your computer.
alerts.masternodesAlert: You are currently running a masternode. Minting will not work on a locked wallet. Do you want to proceed?
alerts.snapshotDescription: As you are synchronizing with the blockchain from scratch, it may take up to 5 hours to download all blockchain data from peer nodes. It is recommended that you use an official blockchain snapshot to speed up the synchronization process.
alerts.afterDownload: After downloading, the snapshot will be verified by the node before it is applied, for security purposes. The node will restart once the snapshot has been applied. In the event of an invalid snapshot, snapshot synchronization will fail, and the app will fall back to a full sync.
alerts.startSyncBlock: DeFi Wallet will now start synchronizing at block %{from}.
alerts.notEnoughDiskSpace: You do not have enough disk space to download and apply the snapshot.

general.updateFailed: An error occurred while checking for a software update. Please manually download the latest release from defichain.com. (Only download the app from official sources)
general.doNotCloseWindow: Do not turn off the computer while this window is still open.

update.updateReason: An upgrade is required for DeFi Wallet to continue to connect to the correct DeFiChain network. You will not be able to carry out transactions until you update.
